I Magid Magid, Lord Mayor & first citizen of this city hereby declare that not only is Donald J Trump (,@,realDonaldTrump,) a WASTEMAN, but he is also henceforth banned from the great city of Sheffield!
 
I further declare July 13th to be Mexico Solidarity Day! ,pic.twitter.com/qYehdHYDEt
Photo Credit: ,@,snappersaunders
pic.twitter.com/x8Add2JUXZ

For any media enquiries please email:

hi@magicmagid.com
Thank you to the amazingly talented 'Son de America' who performed an incredible series of traditional Mexican dances in todays full council meeting! ,pic.twitter.com/DyWLc9CdFG
Is Sheffield taking any American ex-pats? I'm so disgusted with the way the US is going....not sure whether to fight or flee.... And your city seems to be amazing!
Come over, grab a pint, it'll be reet!
Seriously considering that
What a tool
He's the mayor of Sheffield, and you are?
ENGLISH.
He is also a British citizen, or are you referring to the fact he was a refugee evading war in Somalia and has come to this country and is trying to make a difference in our community?

Fleeing Somalia DOES NOT give him the right to "ban Trump", He is only a public servant, not the Immigration MP, who serves the people of Sheffield! He is making a difference  - he is forcing HIS views on Sheffield.
They elected him to do just that mate, you should respect the wishes of the people of Sheffield
He does not have the right to ban Trump!
Yes he does
#,Wasteman, ,@,TobyBourke,pic.twitter.com/VflIAmqKM0

I, an Asian American Woman, who loves her country & her .,@,POTUS, respond to you with WHO GIVES A SH*T WHAT YOU THINK! ,

,@,Mexico, AND ALL LATIN AMERICAN COUNTRIES need to STOP BREAKING MY COUNTRY’S IMMIGRATION LAWS! ,#,FreeTommyRobinson, ,#,FreeSpeech, ,#,UKHasFallen, 

,@,theresa_may,pic.twitter.com/DTkBZu45yo
#,FreeTommyRobinson
You should be banned you asshole.  You have not the authority to ban him.
yes he does

How dare you think you speak for the voices of sheffield! I dont particularly like the man but he is the voted in leader of the usa by the people and so be entitled to visit us like any other us president!

Bill Clinton created this policy of sep. children & parents, Bush & Obama continued it. At least now they're in a children center w/beds, lunch rm & school rm while Trump tries to overturn this law. Dems in congress refused 3 separate bills. But please blame it on Trump.
what's this say I don't speak Russian

I am from Sheffield and proud of our great City. When I heard you were our Lord Major, I was optimistic. I am so disappointed. You are not representing me and our City, you are too busy putting your own opinions forward. This role is not all about you and your crazy clothing.
If you're pro trump, Shef don't need you
pic.twitter.com/Z6v3kFvNNu
How is this tit even mayor? , ,#,MAGA
Can you explain why you support trump?
Can you explain why you support this 'mayor'
Thats lord mayor to you.
Not to me
Respect the office
Nope.
People like you are whats wrong with this country. No respect for those with differing views. It prevents mature discussion.

You are abusing your position, I thought you might be a refreshing mayor but all I see is a virtue signalling click baiter, have some respect for Sheffield and it’s people, being mayor isn’t one big joke
I’m from Sheff ! I think he’s mega.
So you agree he can use his position to express his political views and prejudices on behalf of us all Jon
Yeah. He was democratically elected wasn’t he ?

He’s the mayor and should open schools, old people’s homes ect, make us proud we are different, not stand on tables with slogan t-shirts on and think he can have a say on who can and can’t visit Sheffield. I see no difference in trumps prejudices and Magids

Magid doesn’t lock kids in cages 

I’m immensely proud of him personally .
Think you have been watching way too much fake news pal. You do know Obama did the exact same don’t you?
hi does sheffield take american refugees pls help thx
We welcome everyone. Come and visit.
sounds like my kind of town !!!!
Only one way to find out.
Hi Sheffield can we please adopt your mayor as our mayor too please? Kind regards Doncaster
Not sure we can decide that. Happy to share him.
You dont speak for me, he’s very welcome in my city
no he isn’t
@,fergarrza,  we need this t shirt
Like a hole in the head
Explain how Tommy Robinson is racist or learn why 20K+ marched for him? And why 630K+ people have signed a petition to free him. No stupid racist commands that amount of respect. ,#,freetommy

Not saying that TR or the people you mention are racist but there are plenty of examples in history of even more than 20,000 people marching under a racist's command and even more than 630k people supporting racism.

I found one online for everyone asking and Proceeds are being donated

,https://,teespring.com/trump-is-a-was,teman, ,…,

I'll do it!
do what?
I'll be mayor! I reckon I'd be better at it than these idiots. You can be my deputy and ,@,rajslion79, Can be my campaigner!

I don’t believe you are speaking on behalf of the wonderful people of Sheffield but are selfishly using your position to broadcast your own opinions. 
I’m afraid many sheffielders do not share your opinion on this one!
So you want Trump the war criminal to come? That's sad, bigly sad stuff to hear, sir.

I don’t believe Trump has been involved in any war.  
And as this is a free country he has the right to visit our great city! 
I do not believe that one unelected person who is in a mainly visual position does not have the right to speak on behalf of Sheffield folk.
"I do not believe Trump has been involved in any war",https://,foreignpolicy.com/2017/08/09/don,ald-trump-is-dropping-bombs-at-unprecedented-levels/, ,…
I do not recognise this publication. I’m sure it’s not taken from the Sheffield Star therefore I can’t recognise it as factually correct or to use a trumpism, it could be fake news.

Please explain to someone from a neighbouring town to Sheffield how you think on any level it's ok for our treasury to pay 5 million to keep Trump safe while he plays golf, yet doesn't pay it's nurses enough so they're having to use food banks?

And how much did  we pay to keep Bush or Obama safe?  Now it’s going to cost us even more because of wacko crazy Marxist leftists!  Threatening people at  gas stations and restaurants, what fools leftists are.
Btw which particular branch of Marxism are you accusing us of - just to be sure we're on the same page?
yes he does
Who elected this idiot?
Far left councillors
So they have chosen someone under the quota system and that was the best choice?
ticks all the boxes, they probably can't stand the man

Just another bigoted anti-white, anti-British puppet that should be observed closely both politically and personally - i dont trust these holier than thou people that virtue signal at trivia or subjects nothing to do with them.
Hey, no need to insult Trump like that. I’m sure he’s educated.
Cant anyone see this man is taking the P**S out of his British mayoral chain of office..
So? When have you ever given a shite about a “mayoral chain of office” before?
You mean the respect you're clearly utterly lacking? What a joke!
Serious as defined by what? Wearing a suit? We need inspiration and morality, not aristocracy.
I'd take a clown over a monster.
What a belter!
A pair of nightmayors

hahahahahahaha how are politics real
All Hail the great Trump.,pic.twitter.com/A73FfBXfCK
Get off the table you fucking animal.

is him being on the table evidence that he's an animal? in my house we don't allow animals on tables. and we only allow humans on tables if it's for special occasions (for example: if they're the lord mayor).
Humans do not stand on tables in my house. Nor do they walk around in shoes ruining my carpet. To do both shows either total lack of respect or being undomesticted. You pick.
i don't think you take your shoes off to enter the council chambers
If you wanted to be a pedantic snivelling bellend - you could have replied "Animals are not allowed in council chambers" to my first tweet and saved us both time.
i'm sorry if what i said upset you. i'm not used to talking about politics, i only joined this website to make friends.
Good luck.
thank you friend.
Where can i get that shirt?
I'm surprised you can declare anything. You can't even use furniture in a proper way.

He’s a Token, nothing more than a ‘about to backfire spectacularly’ publicity stunt on a light note.
The darker side of the photo shows an infiltrator giving a clear signal that they have conquered Sheffield!
Ignore him ,@,realDonaldTrump, this guys a muppet and not a good advert for our city. People question how you got to where you are today just like we all question the same about him
This man is amazing. I just wish that ,@,MagicMagid, could be Lord Mayor for life.
You’re crazy.
Bro... where do I get that shirt?
I'm confused! Are you a "gangster rapper" or a mayor. Guess the times really have changed
Can’t be both?
Not a good look, showing the best of the city. With every other 3rd word a swear word.

He was democratically elected. Where’s the swearing? And also hello 21st century... you can be edgey, creative and relevant, and represent with intelligence, empathy, and understand complex issues. Neither ‘roles’ are mutually exclusive. Unless you’re suggesting something else?
Looks like he's taking a shit on history and the post he represents. And they want 16 years old to vote. Vote for fools like him.
Guess he doesn't recognise the Jewish state or the right of the Jewish people.

*you’re

Come on Darren, slow learner aren’t you
Well done Liam .Well spotted ..you’re going to end up with a University degree I can tell !
magid represents our country's values. you represent the values of the bad old days.
congratulations on your ability to read names.

Really do not care what you think at all. I love our President and he is doing what he should do.....PROTECT OUR COUNTRY! We have laws. Come to the USA legally and there will be no issues.,pic.twitter.com/PGQmddS3we

President Trump knows all about your vile cult that's why you're threatened by him

A regressive homophobic one that doesn't allow gay people to practice their faith in any place of worship in the UK maybe ?.

Can I assume that you are saying this because you support the LGBTQ community or because you want to justify bigotry. People can be both muslim and gay, a quick google will show you that.,https://www.,independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-n,ews/muslim-gay-marriage-maajid-nawaz-lbc-a7851731.html, ,…
islam goes beyond merely disapproving of homosexuality. Sharia teaches that homosexuality is a vile form of fornication, punishable by death.

Why would you want to ban such a prestigious man from Sheffield ?, Sheffield use to produce steel for the world over, and now all that's gone and Sheffield has become an housing estate full of immigrants with very low IQs
And this is coming from someone who worships the profit Muhammad ,, oh the irony.
*you’re

Nothing you said resembles thought or reason.
You have to see the irony when you don't know the difference between your and you're.

Sheffield you should be proud!

You ,#,bigot, why do you think that it’s ok to use ,#,culturalappropriation, because you are so jealous of how popular ,@,realDonaldTrump, is, you have no power to ban him and you’ve humiliated yourself cause he’s not even coming to you town with rampant ,@,voter, fraud

Why would he want to come to the shithole that is Sheffield anyway?? Most depressing city I’ve been to- looks like you’re making it like your home Somalia? It’s not world snooker fortnight so think he’s got better places to visit
